events.description: Join us for the December meet-up. We will be talking about how to get started in creating AR and VR experiences

pastevents.description: Join us in Altspace for the July meet-up. We will be talking about the latest news in AR and VR, what everyone has been working on/playing, and exploring the AltSpace environment.
Join us at JPMorgan for the August meet-up. We will have a workshop using Unity and VRTK to create a VR experience. Feel free to bring laptops and VR headsets.

Join us for our September meet-up. We will have a gudied conversation about Creating Augmented and Virtual Realities. In preperation, it is suggested to read the book Created Augmented and Virtual Realities, however it is not necessary.

Join us at the Science Centre for Curiosity Live. This will be an opportunity to look at what some of the people in the Glasgow ARVR community are doing, as well as finding more about different projects around Scotland related to Science. Plus, it's a great opportunity to explore the Science Centre! You will  need to pay to get into the Science Centre.
pastevents.urlTitle: More Info Avaliable on the Science Centre Website
